mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for House, William
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: House, William Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Typhoid fever. Treatment: Congestion of brain. [List of medical treatments proceeds this diagnosis]. Result: Died 1864/09/23 This man was in dangerous condition when admitted to this hosptial; had been in regimental hospital 2 weeks.
